channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump adds 10% tariff on Canada due to a TV ad, even though key economic powers law doesn’t allow its use against ‘informational materials’

item.title: Trump hits Canada with an extra 10% duty because Ontario’s anti-tariff ad ran during the World Series and didn’t come down immediately
item.description: Trump told reporters traveling with him that he had no intention of meeting Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney at the ASEAN summit in Malaysia.

item.title: Russia’s ‘disposable-goods’ war economy is getting busier but poorer, and Trump’s new sanctions could trigger a recession, analysts say
